dmca.title: [EV1-C2366106O] DMCA ISP Notification cactusbike.com/Saris
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 29, 2006 7:42 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2366106O] DMCA ISP Notification cactusbike.com/Saris

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

2006 12:50 am

QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
Return-Path: bdavis@netenforcers.com
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Dec 2006 13:19:03.0217 (UTC) FILETIME=[970C9A10:01C7204B] 

 (multipart/related)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
12/18/2006 
 
7155 5474 4100 4346 4976 
 
Designated Agent 
 
Everyones Internet 
 
Chris Newcomb 
 
390 Benmar Dr Suite 200 
 
Houston TX 77060 
 
  
 
  
 
Re:  Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property  
 
Dear Designated Agent: 
 
This office is authorized to act on behalf of Saris Cycling in this matter. 
 
  
 
This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c) (3) (A) of
unauthorized use of copyrighted material of Saris Cycling Group Inc. ("Saris") (such
copyrighted material is referred to as "Saris Works") by your client, Cactus Outdoor
Inc, at the URL www.cactusbike.com.  Saris' has a good faith belief that use of the
Infringing Material by your client is not authorized by Saris, its agents, or the
law.  The information contained in this letter is accurate, and under the penalty of
perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Saris. 
 
  
 
The specific works, graphics or other material Saris believes to be infringed or to
be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted
images from Saris's website.  Specific violations of copyrighted images by
www.cactusbike.com are listed below this paragraph. 
 
  
 
http://www.cactusbike.com/store/control/product;jsessionid=a7QIvVmHipLb?category_id=MISC&product_id=CAR008

 
http://www.cactusbike.com/store/control/product;jsessionid=a7QIvVmHipLb?category_id=MISC&product_id=CAR009

 
http://www.cactusbike.com/store/control/product;jsessionid=a7QIvVmHipLb?category_id=MISC&product_id=CAR010

 
http://www.cactusbike.com/store/control/product;jsessionid=a7QIvVmHipLb?category_id=MISC&product_id=CAR011

 
  
 
There are various additional locations of infringement on www.cactusbike.com
website.  The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all
infringements need to be addressed. 
 
  
 
Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c) (1) (C), Saris hereby
demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an
expeditious manner.   
 
  
 
If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 352-505-0400, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in writing.  Net
Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already
been involved with this case.  Calls directly to Saris will not be accepted.  If
Infringer does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 12/27/2006,
we will assume that this demand has been rejected and we will proceed accordingly. 
 
  
 
Sincerely, 
 
VCLM Law 
 
  
 
Lance C. Venable 
 
Attorney at Law 
 
  
 
LCV/roc 
 
 
 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
Barbara Davis 
 
LMS Manager 
 
Net Enforcers Inc. 
 
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com  
 
  
 
The Online Enforcement Specialists...... 
 
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
